channel.title: OSCP on xkat3rz blog
channel.description: Recent content in OSCP on xkat3rz blog

item.title: xpimpmykali
item.description: I passed the OSCP and OSCP+ in late 2024 so to give back to the community, I made a tool to set up Kali VM with the essential tools needed for OSCP. During my preparation for the exam, I spent a lot of time figuring out which tools and versions to use which was frustrating and wasted valuable lab time. For example, I had issues with the latest version of SharpHound and BloodHound.
